title: GIMP's Live Vignette Filter Is Incredible | In-Depth Look

media:group.media:title: GIMP's Live Vignette Filter Is Incredible | In-Depth Look
media:group.media:description:
In this GIMP tutorial, I cover the on-canvas vignette filter, or "Live Vignette," that comes with this amazing free photo editor. This features was introduced in GIMP 2.10.20 and allows you to quickly add a vignette to your images while customizing the filter and its settings live on your canvas. You can see your changes in real time while using the easy-to-use on-canvas controls to make any adjustments to the filter before applying the effect to your image. Plus, I show you a trick for a more non-destructive way of adding the vignette to your image.
